page.title: 04Crathie School Extension
page.content: 24 Aug 85 the tar surface was broken by the jcb digger. 27 Aug digger burst water pipes. 29 Aug half day holiday because new pipes going in. 4 Sep started building wall. 19 Sep electric pole going up. 24 Sep big lorry took up roof trusses 25 Sep the builders completed the stonework. 26 Sep the wood was nailed on roof. 27 Sep roof felt on, finished cementing the outside wall. 2 Oct floor completed. 3 Oct wooden frame work was put down. 14 Oct windows in, plaster board on. 21 Oct slates on roof. November painters have started, there is a sink in. Cupboards in the staff room, lights are in. We think the children will be in by January 1986.
